title.rendered: Top 6 iOS App Development Companies For Your Next Project

content.rendered:
Are you embarking on your next iOS app project?

Discover the elite. 

Unveiling the top iOS app development companies that redefine digital innovation. Choosing the right partner is paramount in the dynamic realm of mobile applications. These industry leaders are not just top web development companies but architects of exceptional user experiences crafting digital masterpieces.

Picture a seamlessly intuitive interface, cutting-edge functionalities, and a commitment to excellence. This isn’t just about code; it’s about transforming ideas into captivating digital realities. 

Whether you’re a startup aiming for a breakthrough or an established brand craving a digital facelift, these powerhouses have covered you.

Why settle for the ordinary when you can have the extraordinary? 

invertio, your strategic ally in this journey, specializes in turning concepts into captivating iOS apps that resonate with your audience. 

Let’s transcend the ordinary, redefine digital engagement, and catapult your brand to the forefront of innovation.

Ready to elevate your digital game?

The Apple App Store had 2.184 million apps and games in 2022, with non-gaming apps making up 78% of the store. The iOS App Store earned $25.5 billion in revenue, nearly double the Android app revenue of $14.2 billion. As of 2025, Android’s closest rival, Apple’s iOS, had a market share of 28.8 percent.

Indeed, both the number of Android users, the number of Android apps, and the number of downloaded applications on the Google Play Store are far more than the iOS system. However, the iOS app is still much more profitable than the Android one.

Why? It’s due to a few simple reasons.

The first is less competition in the iOS marketplace, as publishers only accept high-quality apps for publishing on the App Store – they only publish apps that do! 

Second, iOS users are more willing to spend a cent or two on their apps than Android users do not do often

These two primary reasons justify the significance of developing iOS apps on Android in terms of business profitability. Companies seek to hire expert iOS app developers to build apps that attract the growing number of iPhone users.

So, if you are striving to create an excellent iOS app, you will need iOS developers with skills in this field. Where do you find the best iOS app developers?

Want to Hire Top-Rated iOS Developers?

Our talented team uses the latest technologies to create user-friendly and high-performing applications.

Hire Our Experts

Top iOS Development Companies In 2025

Here’s a list of top iOS development companies that:

1) invertio – Top iPhone application development company

Founded in 2004, invertio  has provided IT outsourcing services worldwide. ISO 9001: 2008 certified company has delivered over 4,200 projects with 2,500 satisfied clients worldwide. They have global clients from Capgemini to Affle and much more. It has become one of the renowned website development firms in India.

Your iOS app development experience is enhanced by having more than 50 iOS app developers. This has made them a deep name in developing secure, interactive, and feature-rich iOS apps. The services they provide in their iOS app development package are custom app development, iOS app development, iPhone app testing, and real-time chat apps. If you want a dedicated team to work on your project, invertio enables iOS developers to hire who also work remotely. 

Year Of Experience: 20 years 

Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour

Clutch Rating: 5.0/5.0

Ready to Work with Top Development Experts?

Our team of skilled developers has completed over 200 successful iOS projects, ensuring your app stands out.

Get Started

Services:

  • Custom App Development
  • Web & mobile apps development
  • Mobile App Development
  • Cross-Platform App Development
  • Application Maintenance
  • Application Modernization
  • eCommerce Development Services
  • IT Strategy & Consulting
  • Digital Transformation
  • Software Product Development
  • IT Staff Augmentation
  • Quality Assurance
  • DevOps Consulting & Engineering

Celebrated Clients: Capgemini, SelectSpecs,  RiskLogic, Estel, Candor, Novea, Track Opinion, Trekon, Grundfos, ZenQ, EventDo, Dubai Police, Rina, Tekion.

Technology Stack: React Native, .Net, Java, Python, Chatbot, AI/Ml, Cloud, Blockchain, IoT, Power BI, and more.

2. PixelCrayons: A Top Choice for iOS App Development

PixelCrayons stands out as a top iOS app development company for your next project. With a proven track record of delivering innovative and high-quality iOS applications, PixelCrayons excels in creating user-centric and feature-rich apps. Their team of experienced iOS developers combines technical expertise with creative flair, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.

Known for their commitment to deadlines and client satisfaction, PixelCrayons is one of the best web development companies for businesses looking to make a mark in the iOS app ecosystem. Trust in PixelCrayons for cutting-edge solutions that elevate your brand through exceptional iOS app development.

Year Of Experience: 20 years 

Hourly Price: Starting from $12-30/hr

Clutch Rating: 5.0/5.0

Services:

  • Mobile App Development
  • Web Development
  • Custom Software Development
  • Blockchain
  • E-Commerce Development
  • CRM Consulting and SI

Celebrated Clients: NEXT, HP, TESCO, Adobe, eBay, Vodafone, Puma, Morphy Richards, Citigroup, Qatar, and more.

Technology Stack: PHP, Python, MEAN Stack, ASP.NET, Java, MERN Stack, Flutter, Angular, React, Xamarin, Android, iOS, React Native, and more.

3) FATBIT – Top iPhone App Development Company

FATbit Technologies was founded in 2004 to help startups achieve business success. The company has been delivering user-centric web and mobile app development services to its worldwide clients. It is also known as one of the leading web application development companies.

Over the last 19 years, their 150+ IT professionals have worked with businesses of all sizes, from startups to billion-dollar organizations. The products and solutions developed by FATbit’s experts have been featured in Entrepreneur, HuffPost, Business Insider, Fox 40, etc. 

Since its inception, the company has won several awards & accolades and is recognized by top research & review organizations like Clutch, GoodFirms, Trustpilot, etc. The company’s notable brands include HCL, Wildrobe, UNI Diamonds, TVFplay, and many more.

Year Of Experience: 19 years 

Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour

Clutch Rating: 4.9/5.0

Services: 

  • Web & Mobile App Development
  • Ecommerce Solutions
  • Enterprise App Development
  • MVP Development
  • CMS Development
  • Digital Marketing Services
  • Business Strategy Consultation

Celebrated Clientele: UNI Diamonds, Voyij, Wtutors, SuperLivery, BW Marts, Pendazi, Rent for All, OYO Cater.

Technology Stack: Core Data, Firebase, Java, Swift, SQLite, React Native, MySQL, Kotlin, and more.

Also Read – Building a Dream Team: How to Hire Top iOS, Android, and Web Developers

4) Contus – One Of Best iPhone Application Development Companies

Technology Transforming Over the past 11 years, Contus has been headquartered in Chennai, India, with more than 300 engineers, over 80 mobile and web products, and more than 40 countries with satisfied clients. It is one of the best website development agencies to date.

Its services specialize in mobile app development across all major industries, including automobiles, food, e-commerce, healthcare, finance, and more. Its clientele includes industry leaders like Mahindra Motors, Bank of Palestine, The World Bank, Bars Benz, Lansdowne Bar in Boston, and a well-known restaurant chain, which adds to its value.

Struggling with App Development Costs?

Save up to 30% by outsourcing to our skilled team while maintaining top-notch quality.

Request an Estimate

Explore the services section to be explored with Contus: Android, iOS App Developer, Windows, and iPhone App Developer, iOS app developers hiring dedicated development teams, augmented reality app, IOT app, mobile emergency alert app, machine-to-vehicle innovation app, video and video streaming solution for shopping and commerce Mobile and business banking application, social platform application and native platform application development. To hire iOS developers, reach the company now!

Year Of Experience: 15 years 

Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour

Clutch Rating: 4.9/5.0

Major Services: 

  • Digital Products Engineering
  • Automate Everything
  • Connected Vehicles
  • TeleHealth
  • DevOps, CICD & Cloud

Celebrated Clientele:  Dr.Reddy, Health Sensei,  Sportscorner, VALRT,  Cbazaar, Shoemuch, Learning Space, Wow Homemade, Landsdowne, Hazrati Zaamor, Mahindra Sparespace Pub, BookingLettings, KNPL, Thangamayil, Togo, Trobone, Romafar.

Technology Stack: Flutter, iOS, Android, Cloud, Full stack, AI/ML, and more.

Collaborate with Industry Leaders

Join hands with our award-winning team to transform your app vision into reality with exceptional quality.

Let’s Discuss

5) Appinventiv – Renowned iOS Application Development Company

A significant iPhone app development company in the mobile app development market. Appinventiv has gained huge attention for various reasons, such as quality and expertise, and it thrives as one of the reckoned iPhone application development companies. Its team of more than 400 top web developers is deft. It has the potential to offer more than 900 apps worldwide to both small and medium-sized website development companies of different industries.

Known as one of the top website development companies, the company has been recognized by CIO Review, Appfutura, MAD, Clutch, and Business of and accoladed as one of the top mobile app and iOS application development companies. To develop iOS apps for its vast clientele, the company has a team of more than 10 developers providing services like dedicated iPhone / iPad games, iPhone apps, business phone apps, and much more.

Year Of Experience: 9 Years  

Hourly Price: Starting from $25/hour

Clutch Rating: 4.8/5.0

Major Services : 

  • User Experience Design
  • User Interface Design
  • UX Review
  • Scoping Session
  • Business Analysis
  • Product Discovery & Design
  • App Development
  • Web Development,
  • Support, Dev Ops, Product Launch

Celebrated Clientele: EY, United Nations, KPMG, Domino’s,  Khaleez times,  GOI (Govt of India), NexgTV, Alfuttaim Group, NCR retails, SuperTech, Kmart GSMA, Dainik Bhaskar Tech M, Double

Technology Stack:  PHP, .NET, JAVA Trending JS, React Native, Blockchain, DevOps, AngularJS, ReactJS, NodeJS, IoT, AI/ML, IoT, and more. 

6) Finoit – Top iPhone App Development Company

Founded in 2010, Finot creates robust, customized, and customer-focused software applications. Your mobile app development strategy uses technology to deliver an amazing customer experience. It is also known as one of the best website development agencies. 

User-friendly mobile app development company with over 80 developers (5+ iOS app developers with more than 3 years of experience) and over 450 apps delivered has made Finiot a household name in mobile app development.

Don’t forget to explore the services that Finoit offers: Custom API Integration, MDM (Mobile Device Management) Integration, Beacon Integration, IoT (Internet of Things), BLE Device Integration, iPhone and Android Application Development. For your next project consulate a deft ios development company now!

Year Of Experience: 13 Years 

Hourly Price: <$25/hour

Clutch Rating: 4.8/5.0

Services: 

  • Web Solutions For SMBs
  • E-commerce Solutions
  • Open Source Solutions
  • E-learning Solutions
  • Mobile App Development
  • Product Consulting
  • Internet Marketing (SEO/Web Promotion)
  • Online Advertising (SEM/PPC)
  • CRM/ERP/Other Custom Application Development
  • Maintenance & Support

Celebrated Clients:  Loreal, Hytorc, Eicher, Hansen Technologies, ICICI bank,  Balpa, CT Paeiment, nLight Inc,IDBI bank, Rocketware, Volvo,2 Way, Vezde, Shorepower Technologies.

Technologies Stack:   Python, PHP, Node, React Native, Magento, WordPress, Alibaba Cloud, Azure, AWS, Java, Angular, and more. 

Final Words

So far, we have briefly discussed the best iPhone application development company. We tried to give you the best possible details so you can choose the best one per your project requirements. Doing market research before delving into any final conclusions and options is best.

To create your next project, you can contact companies for web development like invertio (one of the best web development service providers). They can develop a business-oriented solution by considering the needs of your target audience.
